item.title: Access to Menu tab is denied with neither left menu and Url
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Open advanced parameter menu on BO Item ‘Menu’ is not visible Go to “Url_Bo/index.php?controller=AdminTabs” Click on Invalid token continue button Access denied is displayed on page.
